::Oblitertron/Prowl/Firearm::

A charge explodes against Oblitertron's chest as Firearm flies up, the giant 
gestalt returning fire with his optic lasers. An acid shot from Prowl hits 
him in the neck, Oblitertron not noticing it, the damage being tiny.

Swiping a fist at Firearm, Oblitertron hits him, the Maximal flying down a 
bit before his jetpack catches him, sending him back up at Oblitertron.
